zsh_additions.name: pyenv_config
zsh_additions.content:
export PYENV_ROOT="$HOME/.pyenv"
export PATH="$PYENV_ROOT/bin:$PATH"
eval "$(pyenv init --path)"
eval "$(pyenv init -)"

zsh_additions.name: uv_config
zsh_additions.description: Configure UV as a PIP replacement
zsh_additions.content:
# Setup UV as the preferred Python package installer
export UV_VIRTUALENV_ROOT="$HOME/.venvs"
alias pip="uv pip"
alias pipi="uv pip install"
alias venv="uv venv"

# Create a uvm function to create and manage virtualenvs more easily
uvm() {
  local cmd="$1"
  shift
  case "$cmd" in
    create)
      local name="$1"
      uv venv "$UV_VIRTUALENV_ROOT/$name"
      ;;
    activate)
      local name="$1"
      source "$UV_VIRTUALENV_ROOT/$name/bin/activate"
      ;;
    list)
      ls -la "$UV_VIRTUALENV_ROOT"
      ;;
    *)
      echo "Usage: uvm [create|activate|list] [name]"
      ;;
  esac
}

zsh_additions.name: custom_prompt
zsh_additions.description: Custom prompt showing username, directory, and subdirectory

zsh_additions.name: neofetch_alias
zsh_additions.content: alias neofetch='echo "neofetch is not installed, using macchina instead"; macchina'

zsh_additions.name: lsblk_alias
zsh_additions.description: Alias lsblk to macOS diskutil list
zsh_additions.content: alias lsblk='echo "lsblk is not available on macOS, using diskutil list instead"; diskutil list'
